title: New Project Wizard doesn't use default directory
description: In the New Project Wizard, when I don't use the default directory and manually enter '/test', there is an issue...
OB: When deselecting 'Use default' and manually entering '/test', the 'Directory' field becomes empty when I deselect 'Use default' a second time.
EB: I expect that Eclipse should remember the last location (at least while the dialog is shown) when I deselect 'Use default' and then select it again.
SR:
1. Open the New Project Wizard.
2. Deselect 'Use default' for the directory field.
3. Manually enter '/test' as the directory.
4. Select 'Use default' again (imagine you missed the text box by a few pixels and clicked the checkbox's label instead).
5. Deselect 'Use default' for the directory field a second time.
6. Observe that the 'Directory' field is empty again.
